name: GotTrash
0:
”Alexa, open Got Trash”
”Alexa, ask Got Trash about my next collection”
”Alexa, ask Got Trash when I need to put out recycling”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: got trash
des:
Use Got Trash? to help keep track of your city's waste collection days. Got Trash? current supports Seattle proper, with more cities to come. Make your life easier by asking Got Trash? questions like "When is my next collection?" or "When do I need to put out recycling?"
Got Trash requires address permissions in order to the city calendar service and provide accurate responses.
